Title: Life 3G
Description:
This map shows the 3G coverage of the Lifecell mobile network, based on data sourced from MobUA as of 2023.

It is clear that 3G coverage is strong only in specific regions, such as Kyiv, Odesa, Kharkiv, Dnipropetrovsk, Lviv, Zakarpattia, Ivano-Frankivsk, and Chernihiv. In other regions, coverage is patchy, with connectivity available only in select settlements.
